#summary Walkthrough of the HelloMaps demo

=  !HelloMaps Demo =

The `gwt-maps` distribution contains a sample project in the `samples` directory that showcases many of the features of the Maps API.  It serves both as a demonstration project and as a test bed for adding features.


===[http://gwt.google.com/samples/HelloMaps-1.0.0/HelloMaps.html HelloMaps]===
	
[http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/HelloMaps-1.png]

This example demonstrates many parts of the Maps API using the GWT bindings.  Navigate to each demo using the List box at the top of the demo.  A textual description of each demo is at the bottom of the page.
